description_txt: stated on March 21, 2014 in a speech in Davie, Fla.:
quote_txt: Broward County’s unemployment rate of 5.3 percent is "the lowest in Florida."

description_txt: stated on February 25, 2014 in a campaign mail flier:
quote_txt: Says Stefani Carter "repeatedly used her campaign contributors’ donations to rent margarita machines for our state house office."

description_txt: stated on March 13, 2014 in an article:
quote_txt: You can buy lobster with food stamps.

description_txt: stated on March 20, 2014 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Ted Cruz has been to Iowa four times. Rio Grande Valley of Texas -- just once."

description_txt: stated on March 20, 2014 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Ralph Hall is "the oldest member in Congress ever."

description_txt: stated on March 20, 2014 in a post on their website:
quote_txt: "Reporters rehearse questions with White House press (secretary)."

description_txt: stated on March 17, 2014 in a political ad:
quote_txt: Millions of Americans are "paying more and getting less" under Obamacare.

description_txt: stated on March 16, 2014 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Florida ranks first in the nation for access to free prekindergarten."

description_txt: stated on March 17, 2014 in on their website:
quote_txt: The Greenlight Pinellas transportation plan involves a "300% tax increase."

description_txt: stated on March 10, 2014 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Women "are still paid 82 cents for every dollar a man earns in Texas."

description_txt: stated on March 12, 2014 in an email:
quote_txt: The Republican-controlled Wisconsin Senate approved a bill "denying veterans the right to recover their medical costs for cancers they developed while serving their country."

description_txt: stated on March 19, 2014 in a Facebook meme:
quote_txt: President Barack Obama spent "$5 billion paying Ukrainians to riot and dismantle their democratically elected government."

description_txt: stated on March 16, 2014 in an interview on "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: After Russia went to war with Georgia in 2008, the U.S. sent a "very strong message" to Vladimir Putin by sending "warships to the Black Sea" and airlifting "combat troops that Georgia had in Afghanistan" back to Georgia.

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2014 in a blog post:
quote_txt: "In Oregon, students are skipping math class to learn about the Bible."

description_txt: stated on March 16, 2014 in a panel discussion on "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: Russian annexation of Crimea "removes a million residents of the Ukraine that have provided the margin of victory for (Viktor) Yanukovych, the pro-Moscow prime minister in his last election."

description_txt: stated on March 19, 2014 in statements on her campaign website:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama was responsible for "the assassination of at least four American citizens" in drone strikes.

description_txt: stated on February 26, 2014 in a speech:
quote_txt: Georgia has saved $20 million through changes in criminal sentencing.

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2014 in a broadcast of "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: Says President Abraham Lincoln "tried to arm the slaves."

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2014 in a broadcast of "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: Says President Abraham Lincoln enforced the Fugitive Slave Act until the Civil War ended.

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2014 in a broadcast of "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: The American slave trade caused 5 million deaths "or more."

description_txt: stated on March 13, 2014 in a press conference:
quote_txt: The United States has seen "a net loss of people with health insurance" because of Obamacare.

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2014 in a broadcast of "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: Says Abraham Lincoln tried to buy slaves' freedom in border states, but the states "all rejected it."

description_txt: stated on March 12, 2014 in an interview with "The Hill" newspaper:
quote_txt: Says he has supported "George Bush more than I have Barack Obama."

description_txt: stated on March 5, 2014 in campaign flyer:
quote_txt: A "real result" of his term is Georgia having "the lowest taxes per capita of any state."

description_txt: stated on March 9, 2014 in an interview on Univision's 'Al Punto':
quote_txt: "We’re at the point of reaching 2 million deportations ... this is a historic level, more than any other president of the United States."

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2014 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says 50 percent of millennials don’t associate with "any political party."

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2014 in an interview on 'Hannity':
quote_txt: Earth "has not warmed for the last 17 years."

description_txt: stated on March 17, 2014 in a chain email:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama told a room of students, "Children, every time I clap my hands together, a child in America dies from gun violence," and then a child told him he could solve the problem by not clapping any more.

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2014:
quote_txt: Dan Patrick "called for increasing the gas tax and the state sales tax."

description_txt: stated on March 16, 2014 in an interview on "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama’s approval rating "gained 3 points in the last couple months."
